title: Ethereum upgraded to a new blockchain infrastructure. What does that mean for the crypto market?
description: Here's a rundown on Ethereum's 'Merge,' and how it has brought on new pressure from the US Securities and Exchange Commission

title: How to get LinkedIn Premium for free
description: LinkedIn Premium is one of the best tools to aid you in the job search, but at $39.99 a month, it's a hefty investment. Here's how to get LinkedIn Premium for free.

title: Uber blames security breach on Lapsus$, says they bought credentials on the dark web
description: The hacker apparently gained access to several internal Uber systems after stealing a third-party contractor's credentials and then convinced the contractor to approve a two-factor authentication request.

title: Crystal Linux is a user-friendly take on Arch Linux that shows great promise
description: Jack Wallen takes a look at the latest distribution to help bring Arch Linux to the masses.

title: The 5 best camping chairs of 2022
description: Camping chairs are a necessity for all things fall: Bonfires, tailgating, and sitting out front to greet trick-or-treaters on Halloween. And with lightweight, folding designs, the best camping chairs allow you to bring comfortable seating wherever you go.

title: The 5 best smart locks of 2022
description: What is the best smart lock to keep your home safe during trick-or-treating this Halloween? The August Wi-Fi Smart Lock takes our top spot. We analyzed and tested Wi-Fi locking capabilities, integration features, installation, and overall protection in our list below.

title: SpaceX launches another 54 Starlink satellites into space to expand global broadband
description: SpaceX continues to expand its constellation of satellites with its latest launch.

title: How to stream from your iPhone to your TV using AirPlay
description: Discover how to easily display your videos and photos from your iPhone on your TV.

title: The 5 best fire pits of 2022
description: The best fire pits have features like grates to cook on, smokeless and odorless burns, and are portable. With this in mind, ZDNET found the top options, so you and your friends can gather around a fire and make memories telling ghost stories this Halloween.

title: Your MacBook needs a brand new bag
description: Review: WaterField's new Essential collection offers streamlined designs at more affordable prices, while still offering high-quality materials and construction.

title: The wearables market is struggling as consumers tighten their belts
description: Global wearable shipments declined 6.9% compared to last year, according to IDC data.

title: How to rename multiple files in Windows with PowerRename
description: With the free PowerRename tool, you can rename a bunch of files in one single move based on a specific naming scheme.

title: This handy little keychain flashlight can spot fake bills
description: It's small, powerful, waterproof, glows in the dark, and it has a built-in UV light.

title: Lost remote? No problem: How to use your iPhone as a TV remote control
description: Stop fumbling for a different mobile app every time your TV's remote control goes MIA. The easiest solution is in your iPhone already.

title: Linus Torvalds: Rust will go into Linux 6.1
description: At the Kernel Maintainers Summit, the question wasn't, "Would Rust make it into Linux?" Instead, it was, "What to do about its compilers?"

title: Sony TV deal at Best Buy: Get a 75-inch TV for $549
description: Best Buy's sale is not to be missed if you want an impressive TV for your living room. The 75-inch Sony Bravia X80J 4K UHD is normally $1,399 but is currently marked down by $850, which means you can get it for just $549.

title: The case for keeping your old iPhone
description: There's no rule that says you have to upgrade your iPhone every year. In fact, considering growing inflation and the limited new features in the new iPhone 14, frugality may well be the new hotness.

title: The 5 best Kindle readers of 2022
description: Kindle readers are a great way to take your bookshelf on the go. There are several models, however, so it becomes complicated choosing one. The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite is our top choice overall. But let's compare it to other Kindle readers available.

title: The 5 best mouse pads of 2022
description: Limit distractions and work faster with the 5 best mouse pads for work and home. The Logitech Studio Series is our top pick for improving your workspace.

title: The 5 best gaming SSDs of 2022 for PC, Xbox, and PS5
description: A solid-state drive provides faster access to your files, quicker launching of games, and shorter boot times for your PC or laptop. Using flash memory to read and write files, it also better protects your data from loss and corruption. But SSDs can be pricier than their HDD counterparts.

title: The 5 best gaming GPUs of 2022
description: GPUs for gaming are finally becoming more readily available at retailers as well as at prices closer to what they were before the crypto boom. This makes it easier (and more affordable) to upgrade your current rig or build your first gaming PC.

title: This portable HD projector costs just $121
description: Watch movies, shows, and sporting events outside with this portable, high-powered projector.
